meta.name: DESCRIPTION
meta.content: Evergreen Public Schools is one of the largest school districts in Washington state, Evergreen Public Schools emphasizes personalized learning, collaborative instruction, and graduation attainment for all students.

meta.name: KEYWORDS
meta.content: Evergreen, public, schools, education, learning, personalized, teaching,DotNetNuke,DNN

span.span: Shop and dine at Vancouver Mall to earn money for Covington! Receipts can be put in the PTN box in the front office if you prefer not to enter them yourself.

p.span: Our PTN donated almost $400 in snacks to Camp Evergreen! These were items that were purchased to be sold at sporting event concessions. We appreciate their support for our students and their thoughtfulness in how they were able to share with so many other local kids!

div.p: The College Bound Scholarship program is an early commitment of state financial aid to eligible students who sign up in middle school and fulfill the scholarship pledge.
